fixed_template.introduction: The aim of this report is to assess a recent visit to the science museum organized by our school. The relevant information was obtained through feedback forms completed by participating students and my own observations during the visit.
fixed_template.neutral: It was generally felt that the museum provided adequate educational value for most participants. This was mainly due to the well-organized exhibits and knowledgeable tour guides who were able to answer student questions effectively.
fixed_template.praising: By far the best aspect of the visit was the interactive physics section, which made complex concepts accessible through hands-on experiments. Considering that many students struggle with abstract theories, this hands-on approach proved invaluable.
fixed_template.criticising: A significant concern amongst students was that the lunch break was too short, lasting only 30 minutes. Since the museum caf√© had long queues and limited seating, many felt rushed and unable to properly enjoy the facility.
fixed_template.recommending: In order to improve future visits, it is essential that the school allocates at least 45 minutes for lunch breaks. If this change is made, it would help students to feel more relaxed and able to fully appreciate the educational opportunity.
fixed_template.conclusion: On the whole, it was felt that despite some logistical challenges, our trip was a huge success and greatly enhanced our understanding of scientific principles.

fixed_template.introduction: The aim of this report is to assess the proposed marina development at Praia do Norte. The relevant information was obtained by attending public consultation meetings and interviewing local residents.
fixed_template.neutral: It was generally felt that the marina could bring some economic benefits. This was mainly due to potential tourism increases and employment opportunities.
fixed_template.praising: By far the best aspect is the job creation potential, with over 200 positions estimated. Considering that youth unemployment remains high, this could be invaluable.
fixed_template.criticising: A significant concern is that the development would destroy one of the best surfing sites in Europe. Since this is internationally recognized, many fear devastating impacts on surf tourism.
fixed_template.recommending: In order to address concerns, it is essential that an independent ecological assessment is commissioned. Alternative locations should be explored.
fixed_template.conclusion: On the whole, it was felt that despite potential benefits, environmental costs are too high. Alternative development plans should be considered.
